sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Drink } from '../../../models/drinks.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-drink-list', templateUrl: './drink-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./drink-list.component.css'] }) export class DrinkListComponent implements OnInit { drinks: Drink[] = [ { id: 1, name: 'Coffee', type: 'Coffee', description: 'Regular coffee', dateCreated: new Date('2023-06-24'), isActive: true }, { id: 2, name: 'Latte', type: 'Coffee', description: 'Cafe latte', dateCreated: new Date('2023-06-24'), isActive: true } ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { //Get list of drinks this.drinks.push() } }

drink-list works!
